name: Seth Copen Goldstein
content: Seth Copen Goldstein's Homepage Seth Copen Goldstein You can reach me at: Office: 7111 Gates-Hillman Complex School of Computer Science Carnegie Mellon University 5000 Forbes Avenue Pittsburgh, PA  15213-3891 (412) 268-3828 Fax:  (412) 268-5576 Email:  seth AT cmu.edu Assistant: Christina Contreras 7008 Gates-Hillman Complex (412) 268-1120 christina AT cs.cmu.edu The best way to schedule an appointment with me is through Christina Contreras. Here are my office hours for Fall'17. BoLT: Building on Local Trust LLVM related notes: My recent experiences with llvm. Questions, Answers, and hints. Fall '97: Fundamental Structures of Computer Science I, 15-211. Research: My current research is focused on electronic nanotechnology and reconfigurable computing.  I am involved in the Phoenix project and the CMU reconfigurable computing project.  My special interest is in compilers and high-level architectures for reconfigurable computing devices. Current Graduate Students: Field Cady Mike DeRosa Mustafa Emre Karagozler David Koes Mahim Mishra Michael Ashley-Rollman Graduated Students: Girish Venkataramani Suraj Sudhir, Sun Microsystems Hari Cadambi, NEC Labs Mihai-Dan Budiu, Microsoft Research Past Post Docs/System Scientists: Tim Callahan Tiberiu Chelcea
